column4: Hi guys I use ubuntu 8.4 and I want to upgrade to 9.4 I have the ubuntu disk alternative when trying to update I get an error, and when I try to update from internet, I get only partial update and also gives me error, I can do?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
